alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, south central St. Johns, east central Marion and eastern Putnam Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pomona Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, Salt Springs, East Palatka, Andalusia, Fruitland, Federal Point, Orange Mills and San Mateo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
